caller_intent: Christy Anderson wants to remove a 1999 Amigo vehicle from her insurance policy after transferring ownership, and clarify how a recent full payment will be handled.
resolution_steps: Maria confirms Christy's identity and account details (account number 5460976).
Maria checks the policy and notes the vehicle (1999 Amigo) is still listed with Christy's deceased husband, Jesse Anderson, as the first named insured.
Maria explains removing the vehicle requires a policy rewrite due to the deceased named insured.
Maria assures Christy the credit for the recent full payment will be processed later.
Maria confirms the change will be effective immediately.
knowledge_required: Handling policy changes for deceased named insureds
Processing vehicle removals and policy rewrites
systems_referenced: Insurance policy database (to check account details and policy information)
summary: Christy Anderson requested removal of a 1999 Amigo from her policy after transferring ownership. Maria confirmed the vehicle was still linked to Christy's deceased husband as the primary insured, requiring a policy rewrite. Maria assured Christy a credit would be issued for her recent full payment. The call concluded with Maria confirming immediate effectiveness of the change and follow-up on the credit.
